title: Simulation Digits
question_text:
The Athletic Director at a large high school claims $60$% of student-athletes at the school will receive a college scholarship. To simulate a student-athlete receiving a scholarship, which of the following assignment of random digits could be used?
Digits $0-4$ represent a student-athlete receiving a scholarship and digits $5-9$ represent a student-athlete not receiving a scholarship.
Digits $00-59$ represent a student-athlete receiving a scholarship and digits $60-99$ represent a student-athlete not receiving a scholarship.
Digits $00-60$ represent a student-athlete receiving a scholarship and digits $61-99$ represent a student-athlete not receiving a scholarship.
Digits $0-6$ represent a student-athlete receiving a scholarship and digits $7-9$ represent a student-athlete not receiving a scholarship.
